metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20300 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in OpenEXR's hufUncompress functionality inOpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfHuf.cpp. This flaw allows an attacker who can submit acrafted file that is processed by OpenEXR, to trigger an integer overflow.The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20300` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr25 - 2.5.7-1
openexr - 2.5.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.7-1').
